website_summaries.verdict: Buyers love the ceramic look and soothing sound of this fountain, but check it carefully to make sure the spout isn't creating a leak.
pros: Made of polyresin, although it looks ceramic
cons: Some sporadic reports of leaking due to a design flaw with the spout

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fountain!
customer_reviews.text: This fountain is beautiful!! I'm so glad I purchased it. It has a soothing sound and is surprisingly light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn

customer_reviews.title: Troublesome at first
customer_reviews.text: I had to add a dab of caulk under the lip of the top overflow spout to prevent the water from running back under the spout and flowing down the outside of the jar. Also, I had to reduce the pump setting to its minimum to prevent splashing. After solving these glitches, it now seem okay and is a pleasant diversion and conversation piece.
customer_reviews.author: Ed the Heretic

customer_reviews.title: Quiet Subdued Trickling Sounds
customer_reviews.text: I have on my porch, and upon start up, there is a small slight splash in front of the bottom jar, then it smoothly runs inside with no more sprinkles. The color is more of a burgandy/purple rather than terra cotta as I thought, but it's nice and I enjoy sitting on the porch reading with this running. I will play with the adjustment and maybe add some stones to get a little more "rush" sound rather than trickle/pouring water. Set up super easy, had it running in 5 minutes after unpacking. Overall, a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Small Fountain for outdoors or in.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little fountain! Arrived quickly and very well packaged. Easy to set up. Pump lets you set the speed of the water flow. I am using mine in a front coutyard of my home. A previous fountain I had which was ceramic was damaged by landscapers so I went for resin this time. If using inside, I recommend placing a towel under the fountain as when it first starts the water does jump out of the bottom pot when it first starts up. Wouldn't be an issue if placed on tile floor but would be an issue on hardwood.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Baker

customer_reviews.title: I moved it into my entry way and I love it. It is very cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my outside courtyard and it was just too small. So, I moved it into my entry way and I love it. It is very cute, but small. Just know that going in.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K. Schilling

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It’s attractive and for the month it worked, it looked great and sounded calming. When it needed water two days ago Imfollowed the directions it came with and nothing happened. The pump or the pipe leadin up from it is simply not emitting water so the fountain can work. So frustration!
customer_reviews.author: R. Whitley

customer_reviews.title: Burgandy; not red as shown in picture
customer_reviews.text: Pot will do, but the color is not even close to the picture. More purplish, but it will work. The sound is pleasant and no noises coming from the pump at this point. No lights to be seen anywhere. Will look again tonight, but I will usually only run it during the day time. I would not buy this again or recommend to a friend. Too inexpensive to go to the trouble to return it.
customer_reviews.author: cperson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fountain. I keep it on my covered front porch and it is delightful to sit next to. I use distilled water and it has stayed nice so far. I placed rocks in the lowest bowl only to change the sound slightly.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P.

customer_reviews.title: Leaky and not fixable.
customer_reviews.text: I had the same issue as reviewer Dianah N., where the faulty molding on the uppermost lip caused the water to drip down the side and onto the floor instead of going via the channels and going into the reservoir, and it leaked everywhere. It's a shame - the birds liked it and it looks nice. I tried fixing it but it just wasn't amenable to fixing.
customer_reviews.author: V. V.

customer_reviews.title: I and the birds love it
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with delivery and item. Have it on my deck and the birds have a daily party. Holds approx 1 1/2 gallons. I use distilled water to keep deposits from forming. Light enough to carry when empty. When filled it is heavy enough to withstand windy days.
customer_reviews.author: Ldep

customer_reviews.title: It's Pretty But No Water Flow Working Adjustment - too loud for indoors.
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks but there isn't an on/off switch and the water is louder than I would like. Says you can adjust the water flow but tried to and the flow stays the same. Probably would not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy set-up.
customer_reviews.text: This small fountain is light weight and easy to set up. The sound of falling water is on the softer end, but still is nice. My only complaint would be the color. It's purple and I was expecting a more natural color. Placing some flowers around it made the color more acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica G.

customer_reviews.title: It is embarrassing how cheap it looks
customer_reviews.text: This product looks exactly like what it is-- a cheaply made plastic fountain. I would like to say "you get what you pay for" but I don't think a cheap plastic item should cost this much! I didn't have the problems with leaking that others did, but mine did instantly end up with some weird mold that discolored the plastic. It had vinegar from my first use, so I'm not sure what happened, I also tried bleach. Eh well, lesson learned
customer_reviews.author: Brian Silva

customer_reviews.title: Cute porch addition!
customer_reviews.text: Works well, packaged well. The only disappointment is that the photo shows a rich burnished brown ceramic color but in reality it is a dark mauve with tiny black paint splatters. Works well and sounds peaceful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: After approximately a 2 months the pump stopped working just prior to the return window closing. I would not recommend purchasing this item unless you have the time to constantly fill it with water.
customer_reviews.author: Miss A

customer_reviews.title: I love this water Floor Fountain
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I love this water Floor Fountain. I have the Fountain at my Office. The sound is a relaxing sound and is not too loud or too faint, but just right! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Cunnar

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put water in if used inside ,  water sound very soft, not loud enough
customer_reviews.text: Liked color ,size, weight. Used inside and difficult to put water in and clean. Seemed back hole not big enough, water feature not loud enough for me
customer_reviews.author: Laura B Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money! The second jar would collect water from below lip/opening and cause a leak onto the floor no matter how leveled I tried to place it on my wooden floor. I am glad I don't have carpeted floors. Its definitely not for indoor use with this issue. Possibly my fountain was not molded correctly. I can't return it since I tried to shave off some of the excess from the lower lip, which helped it leak less, but did not fix the problem. Its going into the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Dianah N.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Operates perfectly. Good volume of water sounds. I have on my front porch (south facing) - it gets a lot of sun so I refill what has evaporated every couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: K.D. P.

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: In the description and comments it said it was lighted. It is NOT.
customer_reviews.author: throat puncherTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Plastic not ceramic
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was ceramic but its plastic. Good product though. I was happy with it...
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great, reliable seller, nice fountain!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute fountain. Lightweight bit looks ceramic. Unfortunately ours was leaky/defective but seller promptly took care of it for us. Highly recommend this seller and product!
customer_reviews.author: MamaB2019

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Soothing
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful water fountain. Got this for my moms birthday. It was more lightweight than I expected. Directions are straight forward but vague I figured it out eventually. Very soothing and worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL, SUNNING & TALK OF THE NEIGHBORHOOD
customer_reviews.text: Color Accurately described, pump works excellent and no splash if probably filled and I. Level surface!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS THING
customer_reviews.text: THIS LITTLE FOUNTAIN WAS PERFECT FOR OUR SMALL PORCH. I *DID* PROP IT UP ON A LITTLE STAND MADE OUT OF BRICKS TO MAKE IT SLIGHTLY TALLER, BUT IT IS TOTALLY CUTE AND WORKS AS EXPECTED.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great..can you make it not splash?
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound and the color of the fountain. . I wish I could get it to quit splashing water. I have added and removed water, made sure the pump was down, etc. and to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: SKK Reading Logs

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This fountain does NOT recycle the water. I filled it and within minutes it ran onto the ground and was empty. It’s a plastic and a piece of junk. Was super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Howie Aroesty

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound effects
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted....good sound effects, doesn't splatter and fits perfect in my "nook" outside!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Pump died after 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: The pump died after 3 weeks, otherwise it worked fine!!
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: Love the fountain
customer_reviews.text: Love the fountain! Exactly what I was looking for. I just need to weed the weeds, and add the wood chips.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: in good condition. Good size
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived...in good condition. Good size...easy instructions...works beautifully. Would love if it came in more different colors. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Idalia Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Definitely looks better in the photo
customer_reviews.text: Too quiet, different shade of color from the photo and the paint from top of the vases looks ugly
customer_reviews.author: STEPHAN

customer_reviews.title: I love my fountain
customer_reviews.text: I love my fountain.. it looks like real pottery. I have placed it on my patio amidst my tropical plants and it looks great.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: So so disappointed. Ordered this as a birthday gift to arrive in time but it came broken.

customer_reviews.text: Excellent fountain! The water makes a soothing sound, great edition for our deck. Certainly recommend this fountain!

customer_reviews.title: I love this fountain
customer_reviews.text: I love this fountain. I have it on my screen porch and it is so soothing when it is running. There was a little issue receiving the item but the seller rectified the situation immediately. I was very pleased with the response time.

customer_reviews.title: I got my flow
customer_reviews.text: So far we love this nice, peaceful fountain. Easy to assemble and operate.

customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! So easy to put the pump in. Small footprint, exactly what I've been needing for my patio area.

customer_reviews.text: Looks great next to the pool. Not sure about durability but at this time it's what we expected at a nice price

customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, soothing sound of the trickling water...Looks and sounds wonderful on our porch.

customer_reviews.text: This arrived last night. Took a couple minutes to get it set up and filled and we were on the front porch to enjoy the wonderful sound it makes. LOVE IT. Nice color. Blends well with the brick on the front of the house.
